0P0000XVGI.BO.long_name: IInvesco India Financial Services Fund Direct Plan Dividend Payout
0P0000XVGI.BO.summary: The investment objective of the Scheme is to generate capital appreciation from a portfolio of Equity and Equity Related Instruments of companies engaged in the business of banking and financial services.

0P0000XVPN.BO.long_name: Taurus Banking & Financial Services Fund-Direct Plan-Dividend Payout Option
0P0000XVPN.BO.summary:
The primary objective of the Scheme is to generate capital appreciation through a portfolio that invests predominantly in equity and equity related instruments of Banking, Financial and Non Banking Financial Companies that form a part of
the BFSI Sector. However, there is no assurance or guarantee that the objectives of the scheme will be realized and the scheme does not assure or
guarantee any returns.
